channel.title: Loading A Lower Cache?
channel.description:
How Would i go about loading a different cache specificvally from a 459 to a 317 ? something to do with 0x7a120 or 0xffffff
im presuming?

item.title: Loading A Lower Cache?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:12, topic:439144”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=541843.msg3970875#msg3970875 date=1334124960]

First of all, why are you trying to load a lower revision cache?

Second, it would be pretty difficult. You would have to know the differences in the formats, and then “regress” those changes to the structure defined in the 317 client.

This is finna sound noobish but its because i cant f****n figure out the interface ids of the Description Boxes of Magic EX: Level 54: Teleport to …
( ive seriously been trying this for a day or 2) ( i would dump the interfaces but i don’t know how and i was going to use a 317 cache at first anyways
also there appears to be no interface editors that edit the 459 cache except maybe peters but all the links are broken to his

They should be the same. I don’t think they changed the UI layout until 503-ish.
[/quote]
I thought it was changed 474+ -ish[/quote]
Well his server is 459 anyway

Read full topic

item.title: Loading A Lower Cache?
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

zyle1992:

I don’t think I understand what you’re asking. Are you trying to load a 317 cache from a 459 client?

yes
Specifically the PJA 459 User Client
Also Do i have to change all instances of it or only the direct matches? so would i change 0x7a120ab to 0xFFFFFFab or?

Read full topic

item.title: Loading A Lower Cache?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

looks like you changed some hex-decimal code…(I.e. HTML color code)

0x7a120 is ###################

That what happened?

Read full topic

item.title: Loading A Lower Cache?
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

umm waht about if it has like digits or numbers after it ? EX: 0x7a120ab or something like that or 0xFFFFFF72 do i change those to? and do i change it only in the client or the server also? (the server already has a 317 cache) and do i change it in every instance of it or only in certian classes
Help would be much appreciated

I just finished this changing all of the strings matching exactly 0xFFFFFF to 0x7a120 and the only change i see is that it make shiz green like the words and the map character dot? WTF?

Read full topic

item.title: Loading A Lower Cache?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

eyeownyew:

It will probably have quite a few errors. It will be looking for things in the cache that are non-existent. Might not though, so try it

It most likely will.

Just say its calling for a newer NPC that doesn’t exist in the older cache,
it will give you a ‘null-pointer-error’

All you have to do then is remove it out if the auto spawn.

Read full topic
